name: Harvest Dungeon
description:
Harvest Dungeon is a turn based survival game, where you grow food, explore a cave, fight enemies and try to find diamonds.

The game was made during the 7 Day Roguelike Challenge 2021 with TIC 80.

Tips:

  • The game shows A and B buttons, but those are mapped to Z and X on your keyboard.
  • While holding down the X key, you can use movement keys to turn your tool to face in another direction before releasing the X key.
  • You can attack enemies by moving towards them. Holding a sword in hand while doing that deals more damage.
  • You can use the hammer to build walls, but it can also be used to build bridges on water.
  • You can fight the easiest enemies without a sword, but you will need it for the tough enemies.
  • When a plant has grown (potato has white spots on it), you can pick it up.
  • You can eat food by picking it up and using it.
  • Enemies drop seeds, but only when they die on an empty space.
  • Concentrate on food production in the beginning before exploring.
  • Avoid dead end tunnels when not carrying a sword with you.
